mapper.insert: insert into `sys_user` (username, password, email, name, address, phone,tocheck,user_type) values (#{username}, #{password}, #{email}, #{name}, #{address}, #{phone},#{tocheck}, #{userType})
mapper.update: update `sys_user` set username = #{username}, password = #{password}, email = #{email}, name = #{name}, address = #{address}, phone = #{phone}, tocheck=#{tocheck}, user_type=#{userType} where id = #{id}
mapper.select: select id, username, password, email, name, address, phone,tocheck,user_type from `sys_user`
select id, username, password, email, name, address, phone,tocheck,user_type from `sys_user` where username=#{username}
select id, username, password, email, name, address, phone,tocheck,user_type from `sys_user` where username=#{username} AND password=#{password}
select id, username, password, email, name, address, phone,tocheck,user_type from `sys_user` where username=#{username}
